title: Adele wins big at the Grammy’s…and all anyone can talk about is her weirdly bendy thumb
text:
Comments LAST NIGHT stunning songstress Adele accepted no less than five awards at the 2017 GRAMMYs. 
The Hello singer took home grammar phones for Album of the Year, Song of the Year and Record of the Year as well as becoming the first artist ever to score the coveted ‘hat-trick’ twice following her 2012 success. CBS 2 Keen viewers spotted something a little odd about Adele’s hand during her acceptance speech 
She also won the Best Pop Vocal Album and Best Pop Solo Performance prizes, taking home each gong she was nominated for. 
This morning there has been plenty of press coverage for her emotional acceptance speech of Album of the Year in which she shocked fans by announcing she didn’t deserve it . 
The 28-year-old singer explained that Beyonce had been such an influence in her and her friend’s lives that she felt the album Lemonade deserved the title. 2 The bendy thumb was spotted by a number of people who took to Twitter to discuss the unusual digit 
The moving speech was greeted with rapturous applause but keen eyed viewers were more distracted by Adele’s hands than her words. 
As the singer gestured and moved her hand around you can see that her thumb bends all the way back to a right angle. 
The thumb flex was then accentuated by her long acrylic nail which made the digit look unnatural in its bendy state. 
Amazed viewers took to Twitter to express their dismay at this display of dexterity. User @MissHindzz_ said: “Why does Adele's thumb go so far back like that?! Omg.” 
While @MReddy95 said: “Just watched this video of Adele at the grammys. Whys her thumb on back to front?” 
And @TotesMcGotes asked: “Is it too early to address her thumb?”
